name: Stay Safe (itch) (oxxar)
description:
The wilderness is merciless. The cold, the darkness, and the bloodthirsty beasts care nothing about your survival. But if you can keep the flame alive, you might be able to survive for just a little bit longer...

Stay Safe is a top-down action/survival game about staying alive in the wilderness. Your only hope is the fireplace that keeps you warm and healthy while keeping predators away. Collect whatever fuel you can find and put it on the fire to prolong your stay.

Controls:

[WASD] or [Right Mouse Button] to walk

[Space] to dash

[E] or [Left Mouse Button] to pick up and drop firewood

How to play:

 Collect firewood

Put firewood on the fireplace

 

Avoid dangerous predators

 

They will hunt you
